attributes.action: More designated safe areas for 16-18 year olds to hang out.
attributes.background: As the youth of our local area, we have decided that there needs to be an increase in designated area for 16-18 year olds to socialise (no smoking or drugs), as a lot of parks are aimed at young children or are skateparks which not all teenagers are interested in.

rejection.details: Your petition mentions parks, which in most areas of the country are the responsibility of the local authority. You may wish to start another petition asking the Government to provide additional funding for a specific type of youth service or facility.
